dashboard_teacher.title: Teacher Dashboard
dashboard_teacher.no_courses: No courses found. Create your first course!

teacher_courses.error_loading: An error occurred. Please try again later.

teacher_quiz.max_quiz_reached: Maximum of 30 quizzes per chapter reached. Delete unused quizzes to create new ones.
teacher_quiz.no_quiz_description: Start by creating the first quiz for this chapter.
tips: Each quiz contributes to the student's chapter score.
Students need a chapter score â‰¥ 65% to pass.
Clear questions help students understand better.
Use time limits that match the difficulty level.
Edit quizzes only if necessary as it may affect students.
teacher_quiz.error_loading_quiz: Failed to load quiz list. Please try again.

teacher_empty_course.title: No Courses Yet
teacher_empty_course.description: You don't have any courses yet. Start by creating your first course to share your knowledge with students.
teacher_empty_course.feature_structure_desc: Organize your course with structured chapters and learning materials
teacher_empty_course.feature_quiz_desc: Evaluate student understanding with interactive quizzes and assignments
teacher_empty_course.feature_students_desc: Manage and monitor student progress in your courses
teacher_empty_course.guide_description: Follow these steps to create your first course
teacher_empty_course.step_1_desc: Set your course title, description, and level
teacher_empty_course.step_2_desc: Organize your course content into structured chapters
teacher_empty_course.step_3_desc: Upload videos, documents, and other learning materials
teacher_empty_course.step_4_desc: Review and publish your course to make it accessible to students

teacher_form_course.title: Create New Course
teacher_form_course.section_info_desc: Enter basic information for your course
teacher_form_course.field_title_description: Create an attractive and descriptive title (at least 3 characters)
teacher_form_course.field_description_placeholder: Describe what students will learn in this course...
teacher_form_course.field_description_description: Explain in detail what students will learn (at least 10 characters)
teacher_form_course.field_free_description: Courses priced at Rp 0 will be free for all students
teacher_form_course.upload_drag_drop: or drag and drop an image here
teacher_form_course.toast_error: An error occurred while creating the course

teacher_delete_course.dialog_description_2: This action cannot be undone. All chapters, data, and student progress will be permanently deleted.
